articles.author: Emily Mae Czachor
articles.title: Where is Santa right now? Use the NORAD tracker to map his 2024 Christmas flight - CBS News
articles.description: As it does every year, NORAD, the North American Aerospace Command, tracked Santa on his trip around the world on Christmas Eve so children and families could see where he was.
articles.content: Santa Claus made his annual Christmas Eve journey from the North Pole to households around the world and, in keeping with decades of tradition, the North American Aerospace Command, or NORAD, once ag… [+4473 chars]

articles.title: How America lost control of the bird flu, setting the stage for another pandemic - CNN
